query:
SELECT 'tents' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM tents
UNION ALL
SELECT 'strains', COUNT(*) FROM strains
UNION ALL
SELECT 'cycles', COUNT(*) FROM cycles
UNION ALL
SELECT 'dailyLogs', COUNT(*) FROM dailyLogs;
